title: Light client stucked
body:
Hi there,
running the `geth --syncmode "light"` command my console is blocked on 
`INFO [12-19|12:38:50] IPC endpoint opened: /Users/my-user/Library/Ethereum/geth.ipc `

running the command with verbosity set to 4 i get this output:
```
DEBUG[12-19|12:34:50] Adding p2p peer                          id=738089cf6f24e0d9 name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1...                                    addr=197.89.119.98:30303   peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:34:50] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=738089cf6f24e0d9 conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/windows-amd64/go1.9
DEBUG[12-19|12:34:50] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=738089cf6f24e0d9 conn=dyndial err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:34:50] Removing p2p peer                        id=738089cf6f24e0d9 conn=dyndial duration=209.854ms peers=0 req=false err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:04] Adding p2p peer                          id=ce6451832968b8ea name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1...                                    addr=79.136.71.225:30303   peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:04] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=ce6451832968b8ea conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/windows-amd64/go1.9
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:05] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=ce6451832968b8ea conn=dyndial err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:05] Removing p2p peer                        id=ce6451832968b8ea conn=dyndial duration=102.619ms peers=0 req=false err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:05] Adding p2p peer                          id=5807c3d64b4e4e6d name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1...                                    addr=178.164.199.145:30303 peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:05] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=5807c3d64b4e4e6d conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/windows-amd64/go1.9
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:05] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=5807c3d64b4e4e6d conn=dyndial err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:05] Removing p2p peer                        id=5807c3d64b4e4e6d conn=dyndial duration=74.256ms  peers=0 req=false err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:09] Recalculated downloader QoS values       rtt=20s confidence=1.000 ttl=1m0s
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:10] Adding p2p peer                          id=a979fb575495b8d6 name=Geth/v1.7.3-stable/l...                                    addr=52.16.188.185:30303   peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:10] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=a979fb575495b8d6 conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.3-stable/linux-amd64/go1.7
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:10] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=a979fb575495b8d6 conn=dyndial err=EOF
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:10] Removing p2p peer                        id=a979fb575495b8d6 conn=dyndial duration=59.358ms  peers=0 req=true  err="too many peers"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:12] Adding p2p peer                          id=fab194ae516ed68e name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1...                                    addr=46.165.222.75:45710   peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:12] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=fab194ae516ed68e conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/linux-amd64/go1.9
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:12] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=fab194ae516ed68e conn=dyndial err="Genesis block mismatch - 6341fd3daf94b748 (!= d4e56740f876aef8)"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:12] Removing p2p peer                        id=fab194ae516ed68e conn=dyndial duration=39.95ms   peers=0 req=false err="Genesis block mismatch - 6341fd3daf94b748 (!= d4e56740f876aef8)"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:22] Adding p2p peer                          id=352d8d7f86155fc3 name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1...                                    addr=139.216.43.147:30303  peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:22] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=352d8d7f86155fc3 conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/darwin-amd64/go1.9
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:22] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=352d8d7f86155fc3 conn=dyndial err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:22] Removing p2p peer                        id=352d8d7f86155fc3 conn=dyndial duration=863Âµs     peers=0 req=false err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:25] Adding p2p peer                          id=65d01089d2e42275 name=Geth/v1.7.3-stable/l...                                    addr=52.53.188.238:30303   peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:25] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=65d01089d2e42275 conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.3-stable/linux-amd64/go1.9.2
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:25] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=65d01089d2e42275 conn=dyndial err="Genesis block mismatch - dde1c9209b315ed2 (!= d4e56740f876aef8)"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:25] Removing p2p peer                        id=65d01089d2e42275 conn=dyndial duration=172.305ms peers=0 req=false err="Genesis block mismatch - dde1c9209b315ed2 (!= d4e56740f876aef8)"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:29] Recalculated downloader QoS values       rtt=20s confidence=1.000 ttl=1m0s
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:49] Recalculated downloader QoS values       rtt=20s confidence=1.000 ttl=1m0s
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:54] Adding p2p peer                          id=38f64c3f17adeb0e name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1...                                    addr=202.27.197.53:30303   peers=1
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:54] Light Ethereum peer connected            id=38f64c3f17adeb0e conn=dyndial name=Geth/v1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc/windows-amd64/go1.9
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:54] Light Ethereum handshake failed          id=38f64c3f17adeb0e conn=dyndial err=" - peer cannot serve chain"
DEBUG[12-19|12:35:54] Removing p2p peer                        id=38f64c3f17adeb0e conn=dyndial duration=292.681ms peers=0 req=false err=" - peer cannot serve chain"

```

How can I solve this?

Mirko

Same problem here with geth 1.7.2-stable-1db4ecdc on Ubuntu 16.04 64bit.

**Update:** sync actually started after ~10min.

I have the same issue. @promethe42  I ran it for 30+ Minutes, no sync.

```bash
$ ./geth version
Geth
Version: 1.8.0-unstable
Git Commit: 9dbb8ef4aadb8e40aef8b681cf86acd20789abdc
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.9.2
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/local/go
```
I'm running Ubuntu 16.04 64 bit. 

```bash
$ cat /etc/os-release 
NAME="Ubuntu"
VERSION="16.04.3 LTS (Xenial Xerus)"
ID=ubuntu
ID_LIKE=debian
PRETTY_NAME="Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS"
VERSION_ID="16.04"
HOME_URL="http://www.ubuntu.com/"
SUPPORT_URL="http://help.ubuntu.com/"
BUG_REPORT_URL="http://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/"
VERSION_CODENAME=xenial
UBUNTU_CODENAME=xenial
```

I am having the same issue. The chaindata is almost 500M though. Using most recent stable (1.7.3-stable-4bb3c89d). The messages with more verbosity:

https://pastebin.ca/3961335

~$ geth  version
Geth
Version: 1.7.3-stable
Git Commit: 4bb3c89d44e372e6a9ab85a8be0c9345265c763a
Architecture: amd64
Protocol Versions: [63 62]
Network Id: 1
Go Version: go1.9.1
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=/usr/lib/go-1.9
Same here. No syncing after hours waiting. Also using `1.7.3-stable-4bb3c89d`

FYI.  I gave up on this and went with MetaMask as my wallet.

On Mon, Jan 22, 2018 at 11:46 PM, Cristian <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Same here. No syncing after hours waiting.

I encounter same issue:(

~$ geth version
Version: 1.8.3-stable

Operating System: darwin
